data.message: Why does this have to pop up while I am doing something?  This is another "added convenience" that is FAR FROM CONVENIENT!

replies.message: Hi Cass. We're sorry you feel that way. You can hide a story by using the arrow in the top right of that story and selecting 'I don't want to see this' or you can choose to see fewer stories from the person by selecting 'See less from'. To learn more about tailoring your News Feed, visit: http://bit.ly/2rR9XSf. -Jessica
